fields.label: Education Article Builder
fields.name: education_article_builder
fields.instructions: Build your article section by section. Add page, then specify its content.

sub_fields.label: Open in new window?
sub_fields.name: new_window
sub_fields.message: Check this to open link in new window

sub_fields.label: No Content
sub_fields.message: This module contains no content. It is best used for cases where the background is in focus and no content should be on top of it.

sub_fields.label: Put in box
sub_fields.name: put_in_box
sub_fields.message: Check this to put content in box

sub_fields.label: Activate Text Shadow
sub_fields.name: activate_text_shadow
sub_fields.message: Check this to activate text shadow

sub_fields.label: Loop video
sub_fields.name: loop
sub_fields.message: Check this to loop the video

sub_fields.label: Mumo and Mobile
sub_fields.name: mumo_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: What should happen with the image on mobile devices and wcag display?

sub_fields.label: Image Position
sub_fields.name: image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Position the background image using percent. 50% is centered.

sub_fields.label: Entrance animations
sub_fields.name: entrance_animations
sub_fields.message: Check this to activate entrance animations
